children.description: Content rendered within the data list text (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes added to the data list text

component.description: Determines which element to render as a data list text. Usually div or span (React component or element)

onMouseEnter.description: callback used to create the tooltip if text is truncated (Function: (event: any) => void)

tooltip.description: text to display on the tooltip

wrapModifier.description: Determines which wrapping modifier to apply to the data list text
